LanguageData.CE_Launchers.label: simple launchers
LanguageData.CE_Launchers.description: Allows production of basic grenade and rocket launchers.
LanguageData.CE_AdvancedLaunchers.label: advanced launchers
LanguageData.CE_AdvancedLaunchers.description: Allows production of more advanced launchers like the incendiary, triple rocket or doomsday launcher.
LanguageData.CE_AdvancedAmmo.label: advanced ammunition
LanguageData.CE_AdvancedAmmo.description: Allows production of advanced ammunition for small arms and light weapons systems like armor-piercing incendiary, sabot, and high-explosive rounds.
